answerText: nonlinear optics [or NLO; prompt on "optics"][10] In spontaneous parametric downconversion, a single photon is converted into a pair of photons that have this property. A pair of particles with this property is considered in the EPR paradox.
heading: ACF Regionals |2014 | Brown A, Caltech B, and Colonel By | 18 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question:  [10] Name this field of physics which is concerned with systems in which the relation between polarization and electric field is not simply described by a constant of proportionality.
